name: The King of Triads
storyline:
The 328th year of Barcodia,
80 years of war with the monsters have finished and finally the kingdom is at peace.
However, long lasting war makes people drained and they could not enjoy the peace. Warriors lose their jobs all of sudden.
Therefore, government hosts team fighting sports 'The King of Triads' not only to entertain people but also to rescue the warriors from the unemployment.
summary:
20 years since 'Barcode Knight'. New concept fantasy sports game has come!
Set your own team and win at 'The King of Triads' !!
